abstracts.abstract:
Cybersecurity Internships;  Creating the Cybersecurity Experiential Internship and Clearance Readiness Program within the Department of Commerce; requiring the department to enter into an agreement with the Florida Center for Cybersecurity (Cyber Florida) to implement the program in collaboration with specified universities and institutions; requiring the department, using data and analyses provided by Cyber Florida, to submit a report by a specified date and annually thereafter to the Governor and the Legislature, etc.
    
        APPROPRIATION:
        $11,900,000

actions.description: Referred to Commerce and Tourism; Appropriations Committee on Transportation, Tourism, and Economic Development; Appropriations
On Committee agenda-- Commerce and Tourism, 01/21/26, 8:30 am, 110 Senate Building
